metadata.title: CVE-2020-6070 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the file system checking functionality of fsck.f2fs 1.12.0. A specially crafted f2fs file can cause a logic flaw and out-of-bounds heap operations, resulting in code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: f2fs-tools package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
